thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com | 2 of 189
thread.title: David Yeaman

author: David Yeaman
title: David Yeaman
text:
I'm a professional editor and I've been using Pond5 for years now for video, music, and sound effects. They are BY FAR the best bang for your buck as far as quality and price. I'm also not very knowledgable on licensing nor copyright law, and I love that they really simplify it for you and make it easy to understand.
Also their customer service is great, I mistakenly bought the wrong piece of music a few weeks ago. I figured it would be a huge hassle switching it, but I got somebody on the phone who cleared it up in like 3 minutes completely painlessly. Pond5 rocks!!
